title: My fun in Nemesis
body: I dont understand why people leave so much in Nemesis, so far I have played ZIlean and had won and i am currently loading in a Karthus mid game. You learn new champions and have some fun with champions you haven't tried before. Why are people mad at champions they havent played before?

replies.body: So far all the trash tier champs I've been given I have stomped with, the main reason I like nemisis isn't because of the trying new champs or screwing the enemy over I like how there is no meta in them so you are free to do whatever you wish.

It's pretty fun, though I must admit it does it a little boring when you start seeing supports like Janna, Nami, Taric, Soraka etc.. every game. I had been kind of hoping I'd get things like Olaf and Poppy from all the naive fools.
People are mad about pplaying "trash tier" champions. If you are not playing against champions who are meant to be equally bad though, THAT'S YOUR FAULT!

yea its great fun, i dont understand at all why people leave, like you say its a great opportunity to learn/play other champs 
and hell its a massive bonus if they give you an epic champ like Karthus too haha
People are mad for trying 'trash tier champs' because they are the toxic %%%%s who worry about meta.
